sentence.Network_en: Here was a formidable and measureless step.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个重大但难以预测的步骤.

sentence.Network_en: Above were measureless spaces of giddy air, and far, faraway a line of blue sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 头上是令人头昏目眩的茫茫苍穹, 只有在十分遥远的地方才有一线蓝天依稀可见.

sentence.Network_en: Without this measureless and perpetual uncertainty, the drama of human life would be destroyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而,假使没有这种无法估计的和无穷无尽的变幻, 人生的戏剧就会变得索然寡味了.

list.abs: measureless happiness . See Synonyms at incalculable ., 巨大的幸福参见.
They treasure their leisure with measureless pleasure ., 他们以无限的快乐珍惜他们的闲暇时间.
You would measure time the measureless and the immeasurable ., 你们想度量那无限而不可测量的时间.
while a great , measureless radiance appeared in the cosmos , surpassing the effulgence of the deities ., 一道大无量光出现在宇宙间 , 胜于天神的灿烂.

means.word_mean: 1. without limits in extent or size or quantity;

auth_sentence.content: Where Alph, the sacred river, ran Through caverns measureless to man.
auth_sentence.res_content: Where Alph, the sacred river, ran Through caverns measureless to man.
